title: I really like the new Star Guardian skins
body: The animations are really nice and look super clean especially the recall animations.  The Neeko skin is perfect and the Zoe one is pretty cool too.  I don't play much Xayah and Rakkan but they are nice too.  I know some people will be annoyed their champ wasn’t chosen but the ones that were made are super crisp in my opinion.

replies.body: Please let the meme die... just let it die.

Riot fails to deliver as always.

No.

Same , kinda shame no SG Zyra or Taliyah
of course Xayah and Rakan got them , they are too popular 
but cmon why not a 5th member at least

The teaser mentioned something about them getting burned by darkness and their recalls all have them turn dark for a moment, so maybe they are supposed to be guardians that are corrupted by something?

Wasn't it implied at one point that Janna(or was it Ahri?) used to be part of a different star guardian team?Maybe these 4 are her former team members?

> 
> Wasn't it implied at one point that Janna(or was it Ahri?) used to be part of a different star guardian team?Maybe these 4 are her former team members?

Ahri's old team are: MF Neeko Xayah Rakan.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KEI8M9lq,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-08-26T18:01:36.883+0000)
>
> The teaser mentioned something about them getting burned by darkness and their recalls all have them turn dark for a moment, so maybe they are supposed to be guardians that are corrupted by something?
> 
> Wasn't it implied at one point that Janna(or was it Ahri?) used to be part of a different star guardian team?Maybe these 4 are her former team members?

I wish so !

No they're Ahri's.
Ahri, Neeko, MF, Xayah and Rakan(fuck the lore)
Janna was with Syndra and now presumably Zoe?

I also really like the skins! However, I do see where people are coming from when they compare them to Dark Star. At least, I see it in X&R's recalls, but Zoe actually does feel on-theme imo (especially her E), she's just a darker version of Syndra. Though I can definitely understand the argument for her VO not working, but imo, X&R's classic VO's wouldn't work for the theme either, and we can't have 3 legendaries :/. Zoe's VO does fit a bit more than their's do at the very least.
Well, at least my wallet will be save this time I guess.

I actually like all those champions funny enough. Especially with the sol changes I need to play 
different mids so guess I'm buying all of them. I actually do like them from what I have seen too.

WHO NEEDS SAVINGS WHEN YOU HAVE SKINS!!!!
Wait are we pretending this is real or is this actually on the PBE?
It's on League's official Twitter. I think it's legit.

honestly its no doubt they look good, but what they stand for is much more appalling. Its shows riots increasing lack of care for anything that doesn't turn lots of purchases. Everyone knows what star guardian skins look like, we all know the theme, and how the particle effect look like. we get excited because we enjoy this theme alot. we get excited over who will be added next. They chose Zoe, Rakan, and Xayah three champs played to extreme degrees, and completely throw the theme of star guardian into the trashcan. That is why so many people are mad. Of course they look good, but its what they represent that is so angering.
